description.value:
Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: [[/damage 2d8 + @mod type=piercing average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 2d6 + @mod type=slashing average=true]] damage. If the target is a creature other than an &Reference[undead]{undead}, it must succeed on a [[/save con 10 format=long]] or be &Reference[paralyzed]{paralyzed} for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

changes.value:
turn=end,
rollType=save,
saveAbility=con,
saveDC=10,
label=Ghast Claws (end of turn)

description.value:
Stench. Any creature that starts its turn within 5 feet of the ghast must succeed on a [[/save con 10 format=long]] or be &Reference[poisoned]{poisoned} until the start of its next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the ghast's Stench for 24 hours.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]] and a save is required.

Turning Defiance. The ghast and any ghouls within 30 feet of it have advantage on saving throws against effects that turn &Reference[undead]{undead}.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].
